column3: Sorry, but we're in the middle of a simulation. I'm in charge of personnel transport, and I need to stay ready in case of a red alert.
The name's Lefleda. I'm here to make sure people get where they need to be when they've issued a red alert.
Even with the rainbow crystal regulating the environment, the hub is still subject to violent thunder storms and sharp temperature drops. Then there's the glass storms...
If you're thinking of lending a hand during the next red alert, be sure to come and speak with me. I'll see you to the mission site in no time at all.
Your timing couldn't be better─we're under alert! We're still looking for support if you've a mind to help.
So, which mission site will it be?
Thanks to your help, the red alert is nearly resolved, and I'm told there's no need for additional support at the mission site.
Thanks to your help, the red alert has been resolved without incident, and I'm told there's no need for additional support at the mission site.
I hope we can count on you again the next time we're recruiting supporters.
I just received a report from the mission site. They say everything is well in hand, and there's no need for you to head out.
I hope we can still count on you the next time we're recruiting supporters.
